response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This extraordinary item is priced at $950,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and unique features. I trust this offer will be attractive enough for you to consider it seriously. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
